title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 780/94 of 7 April 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79 on the rules for granting aid to skimmed-milk processed into compound feedingstuffs and skimmed-milk powder intended for feed for calves
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 780/94 of 7 April 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79 on the rules for granting aid to skimmed milk processed into compound feedingstuffs and skimmed-milk powder intended for feed for calves
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 (1a) of Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79, the words 'between 1 February 1993 and 31 March 1994' are replaced by 'between 1 February 1993 and 30 June 1994'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 April 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 April 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 30, 3. 2. 1994, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 199, 7. 8. 1979, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 310, 14. 12. 1993, p. 28.
